title: Single Variable Linear Equations—Positive Integers
description: Solve single variable linear equations where all coefficients and solutions are positive integers. Test your ability to isolate the variable and find its value in straightforward equations.

title: Single Variable Linear Equations—General Integers
description: Solve single variable linear equations where coefficients and solutions can be any integer, positive or negative. Assess your skills in manipulating equations with a wider range of integer values.

title: Single Variable Linear Equations—Four terms
description: This quiz focuses on single variable linear equations with four terms. You will solve equations of the form ax + b = cx + d, where a, b, c, and d are integers. The quiz includes questions on isolating the variable and simplifying expressions.

title: Quadratic Equations with Real Roots
description: This quiz focuses on quadratic equations that have real roots. You will solve equations of the form ax^2 + bx + c = 0, where a, b, and c are constants. The quiz includes questions on factoring, using the quadratic formula, and identifying the nature of the roots based on the discriminant.
